mapper.sql: select m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.icon, m.create_time from dynamic_menu m
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from dynamic_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from dynamic_menu m left join dynamic_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join dynamic_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join dynamic_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join dynamic_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from dynamic_menu m left join dynamic_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join dynamic_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join dynamic_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id where ur.user_id = #{params.userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0
order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id from dynamic_menu m left join dynamic_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.menu_id not in (select m.parent_id from dynamic_menu m inner join dynamic_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id and rm.role_id = #{roleId}) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.* from dealer_menu m left join dealer_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join dealer_role ro on rm.role_id = ro.role_id where ro.role_code = #{role} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path,m.component, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time,m.update_time from dealer_menu m left join dealer_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join dealer_role ro on rm.role_id = ro.role_id where ro.role_code = #{role} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
SELECT m.* FROM ${clientId}_menu m WHERE m.menu_id = '${menuId}'
mapper.insert: insert into dynamic_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{isFrame}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select count(1) from dynamic_menu where parent_id = #{menuId}
select m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.icon, m.create_time from ${clientId}_menu m
